metadata.synopsis: The player meets a lady waiting for her Vampire Boyfriend. The player can persuade her to leave.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -134; 14; 876Click on Lorna Esthelian

10.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
10.text: I'm sure he'll turn up eventually - just wish there was somewhere to sit down that wasn't... sticky.

27.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
27.text: Ah - a friendly face at last. Are you going to the party as well?

43.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
43.text: I know. Bit strange, isn't it? But then you have to be open to trying new things.

39.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
39.text: The venue's called 'The Palace'. Not sure what it stands for, but it sounds very exclusive.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: Which party is that? I get so many invitations...

20.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
20.text: I don't know if I should say - it's very exclusive...

18.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
18.text: Oh, go on, then. I'll tell you. It's an underground party. At a place called 'The Palace'.

25.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
25.text: My date's supposed to meet me here, but there's no sign of him.

30.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
30.text: You haven't seen him, have you? Pale, skinny - extremely piercing eyes.

52.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
52.text: Looks a bit like you, actually.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Looks a bit like your friend here.

34.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
34.text: Looks a bit like your friend here.

51.speaker: Astarion
51.text: Oh dear. I assure you it's not.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: It's funny. He was ever so keen for me to come. He didn't seem the type to cancel...
8.context: NodeContext: Hesitating, having second thoughts now she looks back on events

31.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
31.text: It's funny. He was ever so keen for me to come. He didn't seem the type to cancel...
31.context: NodeContext: Hesitating, having second thoughts now she looks back on events

59.speaker: Player
59.context: NodeContext: Hesitating, having second thoughts now she looks back on events

0.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
0.text: Normal. Mostly. Didn't have much of an appetite at dinner, though he said he was saving himself for tonight.
0.context: NodeContext: Hesitating, having second thoughts now she looks back on events

29.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
29.text: He was so enthusiastic. I don't understand why he hasn't shown up...

48.speaker: Player
48.text: You've had a very lucky escape. Your date was a vampire.

5.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
5.text: A vampire?! No... he wasn't... was he?

60.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
60.text: But then... why am I still here? He could have had me by the neck any time he liked...

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Mother may I. I'm positively starved.

32.speaker: Astarion
32.text: Mother may I. I'm positively starved.

14.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
14.text: You think something's happened to him?

7.speaker: Player
7.context: NodeContext: Uncertain, seeing things in a new light

4.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
4.text: He did seem quite interested in my collar bones... I thought that was just his 'thing', if you catch my drift.
4.context: NodeContext: Uncertain, seeing things in a new light

17.speaker: Player
17.text: You know what - I might give this party a miss. Plenty more fish in the Chionthar, as they say.
17.context: NodeContext: Nervous - realised she needs to get out of here

28.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
28.text: You know what - I might give this party a miss. Plenty more fish in the Chionthar, as they say.
28.context: NodeContext: Nervous - realised she needs to get out of here

63.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
63.text: If you see him, don't tell him I was here. Just tell him I, erm, I wasn't ready to be in a relationship. I'm sure he'll understand.

55.speaker: Astarion
55.text: I'd imagine so - there's no way he'd leave someone as appetising as you alone.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: You're right. I'm sure he was perfectly safe.
9.context: NodeContext: sarcastic, he's definitely not just washing his hair

45.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
45.text: I'll be honest with you - he could turn out to be a worg in a skin suit, and it still wouldn't be the worst date I've had.
45.context: NodeContext: sarcastic, he's definitely not just washing his hair

42.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
42.text: I'll give him a while longer. Maybe he's just washing his hair...
42.context: NodeContext: sarcastic, he's definitely not just washing his hair

64.speaker: Player
64.text: I'm sure that's what he's doing...
64.context: NodeContext: sarcastic, he's definitely not just washing his hair

40.speaker: Astarion
40.text: I'm sure that's what he's doing...
40.context: NodeContext: sarcastic, he's definitely not just washing his hair

37.speaker: Player
37.text: I'd cut your losses if I were you.

61.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
61.text: You're right. Just look at me - up to my ankles in filth, waiting for a man with a collarbone fetish. I deserve better!

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Was there anything else unique about this date of yours?
46.context: NodeContext: Starts off gossipping, then realises what he was really drinking (blood)

56.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
56.text: Now you mention it, he brought his own wine with him to the Mermaid last night. Strange smell it had, kind of metallic...
56.context: NodeContext: Starts off gossipping, then realises what he was really drinking (blood)

26.speaker: Player
26.text: I'm sure he'll show up eventually.

24.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
24.text: I bloody hope so - my feet are getting soaked with gods know what. This party had better be worth it.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: I'm sure he'll show up eventually.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Did he say what kind of party it's supposed to be?

62.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
62.text: Only that it was him and a few of his closest friends. Said he couldn't wait to introduce me to them - how often does a man say that to a girl he's only met once?

35.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
35.text: Now that you mention it, he didn't eat much at dinner last night. Didn't eat anything at all - just pushed the food round his plate.

58.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
58.text: I know the Mermaid's food's an acquired taste, but you'd think he'd at least have tried it... I bet he was nervous. He seemed really keen.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: *The individual descriptions could refer to many things, but taken together, she can only be referring to something vampiric in nature.*

6.text: *The individual descriptions could refer to many things, but taken together, she can only be referring to something vampiric in nature.*

23.speaker: Narrator
23.text: *The individual descriptions could refer to many things, but taken together, she can only be referring to something vampiric in nature.*

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I very much doubt you're going where I'm going.
36.context: NodeContext: verbal equivalent of a knowing tap on the nose

50.speaker: Lorna Esthelian
50.text: Ah, of course. The party's a secret - don't worry, I'm in the know.
50.context: NodeContext: verbal equivalent of a knowing tap on the nose
